title: Add root-level robots.txt and sitemap.xml static files

requirements.summary: Add a root-level robots.txt served as a static file with the exact provided contents.
acceptanceCriteria: Requesting /robots.txt returns HTTP 200 and the file contents exactly match the user-provided text (including newlines).
The robots.txt file is served as a static file from the site root (not via a React route).

file_operations.description:
Create a static robots.txt file in the frontend public root so it is served at /robots.txt with exactly this content and newlines:
User-agent: *
Allow: /

Sitemap: https://verithos.io/sitemap.xml

requirements.summary: Add a root-level sitemap.xml served as a static file with the exact provided XML contents.
acceptanceCriteria: Requesting /sitemap.xml returns HTTP 200 and the file contents exactly match the user-provided XML (including indentation/newlines).
The sitemap.xml file is served as a static file from the site root (not via a React route).

file_operations.description:
Create a static sitemap.xml file in the frontend public root so it is served at /sitemap.xml with exactly this XML (including indentation and newlines):
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
   <url>
      <loc>https://verithos.io/</loc>
      <lastmod>2026-02-17</lastmod>
      <changefreq>monthly</changefreq>
      <priority>1.0</priority>
   </url>
</urlset>
